metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0845 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Consul and Consul Enterprise allowed an authenticated user with service:write permissions to trigger a workflow that causes Consul server and client agents to crash under certain circumstances. This vulnerability was fixed in Consul 1.14.5.

criterions.comment: consul package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
